column1: #Text=Iroh says : " This is what I 've been missing .
#Text=I want the Avatar , I want my honor , my throne .
#Text=I want my father not to think I 'm worthless .
#Text=" Iroh says : " I 'm sure he does n't .
#Text=Why would he banish you if he did n't care ?
#Text=Uh , that came out wrong , did n't it ?
